Package es.brouse.game.objects.builders

Class LabelBuilder

java.lang.Object
es.brouse.game.objects.builders.LabelBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
public class LabelBuilder extends Object implements Component
Class in charge of the creation of the JLabel that will be on the interactive interfaces.
